newsitem.title: USA: Omnicare buys long-term care software co.
newsitem.headline: Omnicare buys long-term care software co.

text.p: Omnicare Inc said it acquired the assets and business of Accu-Med Services Ltd., a privately owned long-term care software company based in Milford, Ohio.
Accu-Med specializes in developing clinical and financial software systems for skilled nursing, subacute and assisted living facilities.

Accu-Med's clinical software system, Accu-Care, incorporates data from the medical diagnosis, physical status and cognitive condition of nursing facility residents. Accu-Care then combines this information with input provided by care givers and through various resident assessment protocols, thus enabling the facility staff to develop a customized plan of care and a set of expected health outcomes for each resident.
